quoteEN: Life should be touched, not strangled. You've got to relax, let it happen at times, and at others move forward with it.
quoteES: La vida debe ser tocada, no estrangulada. Tienes que relajarte, dejar que suceda a veces y otras seguir adelante.
author: ❤  Ray Bradbury  ❤

quoteEN: Be patient with yourself. Self-growth is tender; it’s holy ground. There’s no greater investment.
quoteES: Se paciente contigo mismo. El crecimiento personal es tierno; Es tierra santa. No hay mayor inversión.
author: ❤  Stephen Covey  ❤

quoteEN: It’s not selfish to love yourself, take care of yourself, and to make your happiness a priority. It’s necessary.
quoteES: No es egoísta amarse, cuidarse y hacer de su felicidad una prioridad. Es necesario.
author: ❤  Mandy Hale  ❤

quoteEN: If you have the ability to love, love yourself first.
quoteES: Si tienes la capacidad de amar, ámate a ti mismo primero.
author: ❤  Charles Bukowski  ❤

quoteEN: If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you.
quoteES: Si vives hasta los cien años, quiero vivir hasta los cien menos un día para que nunca tenga que vivir sin ti.
author: ❤  A.A. Milne  ❤

quoteEN: You can't blame gravity for falling in love.
quoteES: No se puede culpar a la gravedad por enamorarse.
author: ❤  Albert Einstein  ❤

quoteEN: If I had a flower for every time I thought of you ... I could walk through my garden forever.
quoteES: Si tuviera una flor por cada vez que pensara en ti ... podría caminar por mi jardín para siempre.
author: ❤  Alfred Tennyson  ❤

quoteEN: Love is friendship that has caught fire.
quoteES: El amor es la amistad que se ha incendiado.
author: ❤  Ann Landers  ❤

quoteEN: Loving is not just looking at each other, it’s looking in the same direction.
quoteES: Amar no es solo mirarse el uno al otro, está mirando en la misma dirección.
author: ❤  Antoine de Saint-Exupéry  ❤

quoteEN: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
quoteES: Sabes que estás enamorado cuando no puedes dormirte porque la realidad es finalmente mejor que tus sueños.
author: ❤  Dr. Seuss  ❤

quoteEN: Each time you love, love as deeply as if it were forever.
quoteES: Cada vez que amas, ama tan profundamente como si fuera para siempre.
author: ❤  Audre Lorde  ❤

quoteEN: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
quoteES: Lo mejor para aferrarse en la vida es el uno al otro.
author: ❤  Audrey Hepburn  ❤

quoteEN: You are my heart, my life, my one and only thought.
quoteES: Eres mi corazón, mi vida, mi único pensamiento.
author: ❤  Arthur Conan Doyle  ❤

quoteEN: You never lose by loving. You always lose by holding back.
quoteES: Nunca pierdes amando. Siempre pierdes reteniéndote.
author: ❤  Barbara De Angelis  ❤

quoteEN: They invented hugs to let people know you love them without saying anything.
quoteES: Inventaron abrazos para que la gente supiera que los amas sin decir nada.
author: ❤  Bil Keane  ❤
